煚字的基本解释

煚
jiǒng
火。
日光。

煚字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiǒng］
［《廣韻》俱永切，上梗，見。］
亦作“燛1”。
日光。多用于人名。隋时有赵煚。见《隋书》本传。

煚字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【火字部】　煚； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页677第12
〔古文〕煛【廣韻】【集韻】?俱永切，音憬。【廣韻】火也。　又【集韻】一曰日光。　又【正字通】唐母煚開元含象亭十八學士之一。又孟蜀母煚母昭裔之子，藏書甚富。

煚字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
煚字的起名意思

火；日光。

fire
Basic explanation of words
fire
jiǒng
fire.
sunlight.
fire
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiǒng］
["Guangyun" is always cut, on the stem, see. ]
Also known as "燛1".
sunlight. Mostly used for names. There was Zhao Jun in the Sui Dynasty. See the biography of "Sui Shu".
fire
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Collection] [Fire Word Department] 　煚; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 677 No. 12
〔古文〕煛【Guang Yun】【Ji Yun】? All forever cut, sound longing. [Guang Yun] Fire too.　[Jiyun] One day, it is daylight.　[Zhengzitong] Tang Muyan is one of the eighteen bachelors of Kaiyuan Hanxiang Pavilion. Also the son of Meng Shu's mother, Zhao's mother, has a rich collection of books.
